biography.value:
Often referred to as a “living expression,” an art elemental is an aspect of creativity and emotion given physical form—making it the perfect mascot for Prismari College.

To create an art elemental mascot, a mage draws power from a blend of all the natural elements, extracting their vibrant colors to craft a swirling outer shell before imbuing its core with a planar spirit. As creatures of both precise elemental study and rebellious expression, art elementals can both wreak elemental destruction and emotionally captivate the creatures around them.

languages.custom: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d4 + @mod type=fire average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d4 + @mod type=cold average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[elemental]{elemental} targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a [[/save cha 12 format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed]{charmed} for 1 minute. The &Reference[charmed]{charmed} target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Death Burst. When the &Reference[elemental]{elemental} dies, it explodes in a burst of colored light. Each creature within 5 feet of the &Reference[elemental]{elemental} must succeed on a [[/save con 11 format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded]{blinded} for 1 minute. A &Reference[blinded]{blinded} creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.
